Nigeria ICT Fest (NIF) bụ atụmatụ iji weta mmepe akụ na ụba na Naijiria site na iji teknụzụ ozi na nkwukọrịta (ICT). Ebumnuche nke ihe omume ahụ bụ inyere Naịjirịa aka ijikọ ya na teknụzụ na-apụta.
Nigeria ICT Fest na-eje ozi dị ka ikpo okwu maka atụmatụ ICT na Naijiria ma na-enye ohere maka netwọk gafee ókèala.
Dị ka otu isiokwu dị na ụlọ ọrụ maka ụkpụrụ omume na ebe weebụsaịtị teknụzụ na-apụta, e mere mbipụta mbụ nke Nigeria ICT Fest na Disemba 2015 na Victoria Island, Lagos

Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị dị ka Aubrey de Grey, James Hughes, Ben Goertzel na Natasha Vita-More kwuru okwu n'ebe dị anya (site na Skype) na ihe omume ahụ. Aubrey de Grey kwuru okwu banyere Rejuvenation Biotechnology: Ịgba nká na ọgwụ regenerative.

Micah Redding kwuru okwu n'ụbọchị mbụ, Disemba 4 n'isiokwu a: "Christianity, Emerging Technologies, and the Christianity, Emerging Technologies, and the developing world — Nigeria's role in humanity's future." Ọ gbaghaara echiche ahụ na Ndị Kraịst ekwesịghị itinye aka na ọha mmadụ, ma dọọ aka na chọọchị kwesịrị iji teknụzụ mee ihe.
Mira Kwak, onye na-eme nchọpụta na ọgụgụ isi Artificial si Seoul Korea kwuru n'ụbọchị nke 2, Disemba 5, 2015 banyere otu esi abụ mba na-eduga site na ICT
Ọ kwuru banyere ọdịbendị na otu esi egosipụta ọdịbendị Naijiria n'ụzọ dị mma nye ndị mba ụwa.

Dị ka Ana Frunza, onye nchọpụta na LUMEN Research Center na Social & Humanistic Sciences, LUMEN research Center na Social and Humanistic Sciences kwupụtara mmekọrịta ha na Mascot Information and Technology Solutions (MITS), Nigeria, onye nhazi nke Nigeria ICT Fest 2015 na Nọvemba 30, 2015
Na mmekorita a, LUMEN Research Center na-akwado mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ndị na-aga n'ihu sitere na ihe omume sayensị Nigeria ICT Fest 2015.
